Name: My Soul Forever
About the game: My Soul Forever is a 2D puzzle game about a knight who could control his ghost spirit. Some time later, the knight descended into the dungeon, swarming with many goblins and other monsters. To get out, he will have to show all his mind and dexterity, and skill. Find keys, keys to rooms, avoid obstacles, and spirit catchers, they are extremely dangerous, the spirit dies - there will be no knight. Game functions: dual character control, an unforgettable adventure about a knight, graphics by wineloco, music by Popro.
